Prior Codifications

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2 of NCRC and AWC Debt Acquisition Delegation Authority Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16- 405, June 26, 2006, 53 DCR 5417).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-162, see notes following § 2-1219.16.

For Law 17-138, see notes following § 2-1219.01.

heading.catch_text: Revenue bonds, notes, or other obligations. [Repealed]
